name: OpenPM
body:
### Welcome to Open PM Project.
If you are a software company, you will find here a development for getting an initial software solution for costing and make a tracking financial topics of your projects
If you like, help us... thanks you!!! it's better for all of us.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Help us
For now we have a lot of work, you can suggest us new features, work in documentation or/and report issues.  We plan to start a GUI phase this month (feb/2014),  For now we have business logic components and tdd artifacts, of course he have a few interfaces
### Power by...
For now we hope that you can support us with work, and thanks special for Software Evolutivo http://www.softwareevolutivo.com.ec for the time
### Write us...
For everything that you need, pls refer to issues section or write to contactos@softwareevolutivo.com.ec

"Sharing knowledge is the best way for help people"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
